# The `PossiblyDisjointInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An or instruction, which can be marked as &quot;disjoint&quot;, indicating that the inputs don&#39;t have a 1 in the same bit position. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An or instruction, which can be marked as &quot;disjoint&quot;, indicating that the inputs don&#39;t have a 1 in the same bit position.

Meaning this instruction can also be treated as an add.

Definition at line 400 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instrtypes-h">InstrTypes.h</a>.
